sentences: William G. Waite (October 1917, in Massachusetts â€“ 1980) was an American-born musicologist.
He began his teaching career in 1947 and received his PhD in 1951.
[1]  His textbook, The Art of Music (1962), written with Beekman Cannon and Alvin Johnson, was a popular introductory music text for many years.
He died from pancreatic cancer in 1980.
